name: Evil's Apprentice
description:
This was my very first game, and I stumbled upon it from some old files, so I'm letting everyone see it now. No changes have been made to preserve the historical accuracy; if it's super buggy though, I may release some updates.

Main Features:

  • You play an undead henchman that can recruit other undead.
  • There is no experience system. Killing people will make them drop body parts, which are used for healing and permanent stat gains.
  • Weird equipment system based on the four humours
  • A bunch of really lame puns
  • Really grindy because I was shooting for 1 hour of playtime
  • Awkward clash of RPG Maker base assets and my own stuff because I wanted to do everything custom but didn't have the time

Please let me know what you think!
